entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH SCATTERED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
ISOLATED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
